name: Counter Killer 3D
description:
Test your sniper sharpshooter skills against terrorist enemy soldiers in this modern army base battlefield. Rage warfare against modern terrorism and as the lone sniper commando you have to kill and recapture your country's army base camp to retain freedom. Counter attack and strike furiously to eliminate enemy commando warriors with your automatic sniper gun.

Features:
- 3D Locations
- Effective control over the guns
- Collection of different weapons
- Exciting map with realistic fighting arena environment

Its totally free to play.
